DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire 16 Past 30 Days Assistance Used to Quit or Stay Off Smoking Cigarettes Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the assistance they have used to quit or to stay off smoking cigarettes in the past 30 days.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cancer Patient Tobacco Use Questionnaire Assistance Used to Quit or Stay Off Smoking Cigarettes Past 30 Days
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure._A question about the assistance an individual used in the past 30 days to quit or stay off smoking cigarettes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire developed for the baseline and longitudinal assessment of tobacco use in the cancer setting. Domains include cigarette smoking history and current use, use relative to cancer diagnosis and treatment, other tobacco product use, cessation, and second-hand exposure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: In the past 30 days, what ass
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the past 30 days, what assistance have you used to quit (or to stay off) smoking cigarettes?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value sets in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these CDEs.
